tool_description: Access Depop's public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive product information retrieval such as Search Results, Reviews, Product information and Seller Data.
name: Depop Thrift
title: Depop Thrift

api_list.name: Search Results
api_list.description: Need more data from the same source or other sources? [Contact Us](https://tally.so/r/mVzr7j)

required_parameters.name: sortBy
required_parameters.description: Sort By: **relevance, priceAscending, priceDescending, popular, newlyListed**

required_parameters.name: countryCode
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Countries** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: colors
optional_parameters.description:
Format: color,color,color
Can be obtained through the **Colors** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sizes
optional_parameters.description:
Format: id,id,id
Can be obtained through the **Sizes** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: categoryId
optional_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Categories** endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: brands
optional_parameters.description:
Format: id,id,id
Can be obtained through the **Brands** endpoint.

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://depop-thrift.p.rapidapi.com/getCountries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "depop-thrift.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://depop-thrift.p.rapidapi.com/getCountries"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Seller Products

required_parameters.name: which
required_parameters.description:
Type of Products: all, selling, sold.
selling is for what is currently being sold
sold is for what has been already sold
all is for both.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through **Seller Information** Endpoint.

api_list.name: Seller Information

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Search Results and Product Information** endpoints.

api_list.name: Feedback Information
api_list.description: Get feedback information by user (Purchased and Sold, 24 each max) from Depop.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Seller Information** endpoints.

api_list.name: Product Information

required_parameters.name: inBags
required_parameters.description: Shows how many of the Product is currently added to user's bags.

required_parameters.name: slug
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the **Search Results** endpoint.
